TopicTitle: Major Missile's Mega Demon, Super-manuverable Fighter

Articles.Content:
Introducing the F-666 Mega Demon, a super-maneuverable developed by Major Missile Defense Industries. Most of these fighters can pull over 15G and are totally bad-ass. This pack adds 9 new crafts that require but 2 mods, BDArmory, and Modular Rocket Systems (MRS), plus a bonus readme, although most of us will not read it anyways. (Who cares!) Warning: Some crafts may or may not be Haunted. No refunds.

Pretty pictures:

The pictures aren't even registering, nor does there seem to be any kind of download link.

I also have no clue what site your hosting the images on but I would suggest imgur, and I would suggest KerbalX and/or dropbox for the craft files.
